message: Should I go with my name for the domain name? Or should I title it something (ex. JoelOnSoftware.com)?
Presumably part of the purpose of having the blog is to claim one of the top search results when someone checks your name. Having your name in the domain name makes it easier to do that.
The issue is that jaredbrown.com is not available. So I'd need to go with another tld such as .me
If you can buy your own name, why not?
i've always used http://domai.nr/ to come up with ideas.. it's really great for short domains too
I've used that before. But really I know the ones I have to choose from already.
I prefer to have my name in my domain, but I also like having as high a search ranking as possible.
I went with jaredbrown.me - thanks guys
